participant_1.name: Jasmine
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, enjoys standing out and expressing individuality.
participant_1.background: I love listening to rap music with my dog. skateboarding is a hobby of mine. I'm a brunette who loves to organize and stand out in a crowd with my leather clothes. I live in a small home and love my collection of comic books. I want to be alone sometimes.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, enjoys storytelling and creativity.
participant_2.background: I started a webcomic about my love of Game of Thrones and my ink stained shirts. I own an iphone. I had a minor surgery on my hand last year, but I'm all healed up now. I like watching tv in my free time as well. I will share my love for hamburgers with others through my let's plays.

content.text: Hi there, how's your day going?
Pretty great so far! Just got back from a skatepark, how about you?
I've been watching TV, I'm thinking about starting a webcomic soon.
That sounds like fun, what will it be about?
I'm not sure yet, maybe about my love of Game of Thrones or my ink stained shirts.
Those both sound like interesting topics. I'm sure you'll do a great job with it!
Thanks, I'm excited to get started.
Me too! I'll be sure to check it out when it's finished.
No problem, what else do you like to do in your free time?
I like to watch TV, play video games, and cook.
Those all sound like fun things to do. What's your favorite TV show?
I really like Game of Thrones, but I also enjoy watching comedies like The Office and Parks and Recreation.
Those are both great shows! I'm a big fan of Game of Thrones too.
It's such a good show, I'm really excited for the next season.
Me too, I'm not sure how I'm going to wait until it comes out!
We'll just have to keep ourselves busy until then.
That's right, I'm sure we'll find something to do
